data.text:
Starting now: @antonioguterres brings together leaders & experts to build stronger political consensus for a coordinated global response to #COVID19 and champion urgency of equitable access to effective vaccines. 

Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmUzNN https://t.co/Es9xMfFfQ8

.@UNReliefChief has devoted his life to working for the world's most vulnerable people.

Hear how traveling to Africa as a young student set him on a path to coordinating global humanitarian responses for @UNOCHA. https://t.co/OPcdN5rqcb

Forwarded messages can spread harmful misinformation, especially amid #COVID19. 

Check out this video to see how you can help stop misinformation spreading on WhatsApp.

For more Verified information, sign up here: https://t.co/GqzOfWkty1 https://t.co/P5vuymkjvS

Translation facilitates dialogue, understanding & cooperation and contributes to the #GlobalGoals.

Wednesday is International #TranslationDay: https://t.co/LSIq8xSS4E https://t.co/BZCpvcklFL

#Covid19 😷 
Human Rights ⚖️
Peace 🕊 
#ClimateAction ♻️ 

Just some of the global issues discussed at the 75th #UNGA general debate, which wrapped up on Tuesday. https://t.co/VWvjoYGE5T https://t.co/pDQxWM0P1J

"We need a ‘people’s vaccine’ that is affordable and available to all."

On Wednesday, @antonioguterres brings together leaders to reaffirm global commitment to accessibility of #COVID19 tests & treatment.  https://t.co/spIMMKj1Ni

"The most natural way to feed the planet is fighting food waste."

--@massimobottura, the newest @UNEP Goodwill Ambassador, shares tips on what everyone can do to achieve #ZeroHunger. https://t.co/OxKtFnBpUC #SDGLive https://t.co/WLC3KDeDyr
Torrential rains & flooding across South Sudan have left hundreds of thousands homeless and could result in catastrophic levels of hunger, warns @WFP. https://t.co/i0LyA6KQjL

"We have a great opportunity to reach people with good information & solid public health guidance based on science."

-- UN's @MelissaFleming talks about the important work of countering misinformation during the #COVID infodemic. https://t.co/OxKtFnBpUC #SDGLive https://t.co/Gn17Pwst1C

When food is wasted, the resources that went into producing that food are also lost.

We can all help reduce food waste:
✏️ Have a weekly meal plan
👨‍🍳 Be creative with recipes
🥦 Eat leftovers

Tuesday is the Int'l Day of Food Loss & Waste: https://t.co/psSIsyF4vG via @FAO https://t.co/cNZq2jfZJe

As the relentless hunt for a vaccine continues, let’s do our part to save lives: Keeping physical distance. Wearing a mask. Washing hands.

-- @antonioguterres as the world reached 1 million deaths from #COVID19. https://t.co/QIULedk0Rd https://t.co/OA2MHzNMgZ

"The #COVID19 pandemic has underlined the fragility of our food systems, and worsened food loss and waste in many countries. We need new approaches and solutions."

-- @antonioguterres on Tuesday's first-ever International Day of Food Loss & Waste. https://t.co/ubCrOqA9c2 https://t.co/otRGyg2eD0

The risk of cardiovascular disease can be reduced through:

🍎🥦healthier diet
🤸‍♂️physical activity
🚭quitting use of tobacco 
🥃avoiding harmful consumption of alcohol

More from @WHO on #WorldHeartDay: https://t.co/OaFJZHG176 https://t.co/Roii5dTbOe

Watch live as world leaders meet to discuss financing for development during the #COVID19 pandemic.

https://t.co/26FnIvRWMM

"We must stamp out the horrifying increase in violence against women & girls during the #COVID19 pandemic. This is a hidden war on women."

-- @antonioguterres at #UNGA. https://t.co/qBHRKooh5i https://t.co/K7rLSoDIdT

"We can overcome this challenge. But we must learn from the mistakes.
Responsible leadership matters.
Science matters.
Cooperation matters.
And misinformation kills."

-- @antonioguterres as the world reaches 1 million deaths from #COVID19. https://t.co/QIULed2pZF https://t.co/rpHaHLslnz

Globally, 1 in 3 women experience violence in their lifetime. Risks are even higher during conflicts & crises, like #COVID19.

At #UNGA, @UNODC Goodwill Ambassador & Nobel Laureate @NadiaMuradBasee calls for political will to end gender-based violence.

https://t.co/YV5xUL3tlh

1.3 billion tons of food are lost or wasted each year. Yet, 1 in 9 people go to bed hungry every day.

More from @FAO on Tuesday's first-ever International Day of Food Loss & Waste. https://t.co/l8IigceARA https://t.co/bPMe7JxNol

Less than 10% of countries have enacted gender-sensitive measures to support women's economic security amid #COVID19.

@UN_Women & @UNDP's gender tracker finds that #coronavirus recovery policies of most nations do not include women's needs. https://t.co/06x8dY9EnX https://t.co/XKlPVZdUeV

Living more sustainably doesn't have to be difficult.

The new #ActNow app helps you protect our planet -- through fun and engaging actions you can track. https://t.co/4i2kqgHfrb https://t.co/DvdGrmkz8T

.@UNICEF is helping refugees & migrants affected by the fires in Lesvos, Greece, with emergency supplies and education kits.

More on how they work to respond to education needs during emergencies: https://t.co/cmAZrAYCev https://t.co/s75pXdACDZ

Healthy ecosystems support economic growth, sustain billions of livelihoods, protect food & water security and stabilize our climate. 

The virtual #NatureForLife Hub has more on how protecting nature can help achieve the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/AKfVRVE4J3 https://t.co/dwWyUq9U6Y

Educate.
Vaccinate.
Eliminate.

@WHO explains how to prevent and #EndRabies on Monday's World Rabies Day: https://t.co/2eBFWhMIWR https://t.co/oPyIg253Xa

To achieve the #GlobalGoals & leave no one behind, access to accurate information is essential.

More from @UNESCO on Monday's #AccessToInfoDay. https://t.co/p1zqSdHsZC https://t.co/rTu5LWReeW

Rabies is a vaccine-preventable viral disease which occurs in more than 150 countries and territories.

More from @WHO on Monday's World Rabies Day. https://t.co/4AQHEWn3b5 https://t.co/37qadvof66

The free flow of accurate and reliable information empowers people, and is key to overcoming the #COVID19 pandemic.  

Monday is #AccessToInfoDay. https://t.co/p1zqSdpS84 via @UNESCO https://t.co/Ca0aeXqaEw

From small pox to HPV — vaccines save millions of lives every year. Share this graphic to show you support science and medicine in the fight against deadly disease. 

For more Verified updates, sign up here: https://t.co/GqzOfW2S9r #VaccinesWork https://t.co/2NNgRpFXQX
From #GlobalGoals to @UNICEF supporters @BTS_twt, don't miss the new GIFs in our special #UNGA story on @GIPHY: https://t.co/czXU785TCO https://t.co/UmfxwYS8jC

🎤 Take the podium and share your vision for the future

or

🔄 Spin the wheel and highlight one of the #GlobalGoals

At this critical time, show your support for a better world through our special @Instagram filters: https://t.co/3vQxUy6eJ3 https://t.co/90etuSbf2a

Amid #COVID19, more than 1 million people from all over the world shared their aspirations for the future. 

Their answers showed that we are all united in our hopes & fears and there is more that unites than divides us: https://t.co/W9E0NUrSbd #UN75 https://t.co/akxTDeWY7L

Ecosystems support all life on Earth & protecting them can help end poverty, combat the climate crisis & prevent a mass extinction.

More from @UNEP: https://t.co/dErHsllObA  #GenerationRestoration https://t.co/3Y8PTreRY8

"We have an unprecedented opportunity to transform the relationship of the tourism sector with people, nature, the climate & the economy."

-- @antonioguterres on Sunday's World Tourism Day. https://t.co/J2ANkFJEMP #WTD20 #GlobalGoals https://t.co/pd8pEl5Vlp

The #COVID19 pandemic has taught us our choices matter.

As we look to the future, let us make sure we choose wisely.  

-- @antonioguterres at the opening of this week's #UNGA. https://t.co/1WX16STXYa https://t.co/2z8g3pOEXP

#COVID19 has significantly impacted tourism, leading to huge economic losses & millions of jobs at risk.

On Sunday's World Tourism Day, learn how @UNWTO is working to promote more sustainable, inclusive & resilient tourism. https://t.co/DKaMeHG776 #WTD20 https://t.co/EmIppTXRvW

.@UNReliefChief coordinates humanitarian responses to crises around the world for @UNOCHA.

In new episode of Awake At Night podcast, he shares with @MelissaFleming what motivated him to devote his life to help people suffering from war, poverty & famine. https://t.co/OPcdN5J1AL https://t.co/KFJcfk4fkq

#UNGA General Debate continues - watch it live. https://t.co/GQroy46gpJ

https://t.co/efxWU6hvWW

Those who built the UN 75 years ago had lived through a pandemic, a global depression, genocide & world war.

The #COVID19 pandemic is a crisis unlike any we have ever seen.

Today, we face our own 1945 moment.

-- @antonioguterres https://t.co/1WX16SCmzA #UNGA https://t.co/BTDousAiR7

The 75th #UNGA will be remembered for being a historic, largely online session.

In our latest UNComplicated podcast, hear how diplomacy & multilateralism have adapted to the virtual world amid #COVID19. 🎧 
https://t.co/ZpHhQAuFud

Every woman and girl in every part of the world should have access to the contraceptive method of her choice.

On Saturday's #WorldContraceptionDay and every day, @UNFPA works to ensure access to safe, voluntary family planning. https://t.co/vo0OCHQf6G https://t.co/BxMQ57P9hY

“The only guarantee against the use of these abhorrent weapons is their total elimination.” 
 
--@antonioguterres on Saturday's International Day for the Total Elimination of Nuclear Weapons. https://t.co/ol5Q5uoM7O https://t.co/vCcXtJeZkX

Two years after the launch of #Youth2030, it's as important as ever that young people speak up for their future.

Use #YouthLead in your own language, and tell us what youth leadership looks like to you. https://t.co/ziwo6ep4Pj via @UNYouthEnvoy https://t.co/jAPSlh5vy3

The 5th anniversary of the #ParisAgreement will be an important moment to continue raising climate ambition.

I look forward to working closely on this event with the leaders of Chile, UK, France & others to deliver increased ambition.

-- @antonioguterres #ClimateAction https://t.co/yKHiyMiy9a

"Either we come together in global institutions that are fit for purpose, or we will be crushed by divisiveness & chaos."

-- @antonioguterres tells Security Council, calling for stronger international cooperation amid #COVID19. https://t.co/tfLL2N3Gzc

https://t.co/L4HS1CFFWu

The climate crisis is a global crisis, and music is the most unifying of all of the arts. 
We need a unifying power like that to make change.
